sentences.sContent: Supporters of the death penalty argue that it would deter criminals from carrying guns.
sentences.sCn: 死刑的支持者辩称，死刑可以阻止罪犯携带枪支。

remMethod.val: de + ter(=terr吓唬) → 威慑， 阻止

trans.tranOther: To deter someone from doing something means to make them not want to do it or continue doing it
